blocks.content:
**Availability**

Right now, I'm contracting at The Co-op, working on their [Legal Services](https://www.co-oplegalservices.co.uk/ "Co-op Legal Services") website. They've extended my contract until November 2020 so I won't be looking for a new role until September at the earliest.

**What This Site Is For**

In addition to sharing some of my client work, I wanted to start publishing some of the tools I've built for myself over the past few years. I'll be adding them in the near future.

hero.headline: Hi there!
hero.textline: My name is John Peden and I'm a contract front-end web developer based in Manchester.
